cast.overview: High school student Shun Takahata is bored. Bored with the day-to-day monotony of school and life, he prays for change, for something exciting. Suddenly, he and his classmates are forced to play deadly children's games and facing terrifying creatures from a talking Daruma doll to a sharp-clawed lucky cat.
cast.title: As the Gods Will

details.biography:
Taisuke Nishimura (born January 15, 1967) is a Japanese actor, voice actor, screenwriter, and director. He is the leader of the theater group Guanyaon and is affiliated with Seinenza Film Production.

The main TV dramas are “ Musashi MUSASHI ” and “ Konaga ga ” (both NHK Taiga Drama ). In the stage version of "Matama Matazo Produced Performance Oi! Ryoma " (original work: Tetsuya Takeda / Yu Koyama ), he is in charge of the script and directing. In addition to the stage, he writes screenplays for dramas and movies.
details.name: Taisuke Nishimura
